attributes.review:
I was a girl in the village doing all right 
Then I became a princess over night 
Now I gotta figure out how to do it right 
So much to learn and see! 

Up in the castle with my new family 
And a school that's just for royalty 
A whole enchanted world is waiting for me 
I'm so excited to be... (Sofia the First!) 

I'm finding out what being royal's all about (Sofia the First!) 
Making my way, it's an adventure every day! (Sofia) 
It's gonna be my time (Sofia) 
To show them all that I'm 
Sofia the First!
attributes.title: NOT GOOD!

attributes.review: no matter my political or moral beliefs about this app, i would just like to say this app as a software is garbage. i’ve seen a few reports in the comments about repeated crashing, the app is slow and has a large delay at some points and i don’t like the fact i have to sign in to view a presidential agenda that should already be public. it’s very suspect and does not make trump, nor the app developers seem very professional.
attributes.title: why

attributes.review: I wanted to get the app to support our powerful ✨orange✨. But the app I would click on it and it would never open! No matter how many times i click on it just didn’t work. So this app is a no❤️
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: I can’t even open it all the way because it crashes my phone and it is a waste of time and definitely deserves what rating it’s getting
attributes.title: This app is horrible

attributes.review: I got this app to show my support to bunker boy but it took hours to download and when you first open it there’s a giant scary orange monster looking at you holding his fist up. I felt extremely uncomfortable by that image.
attributes.title: Worst app I have ever used

attributes.review: Trump talked about hitting grandmas and don’t think that is someone we want to be president grandma is very mad and not happy with the actions and thinks that trump should be voted out his plans are bad and grandma is hurting she believes blm and people that are lgbtq+ deserve rights in conclusion this app is horrible and I’m deleting it
attributes.title: Noo grandma

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because i was so ✨e x c i t e d✨ to support such a great president. The app was so glitchy and this horrible picture popped up when i opened the app. It was of a fat orange Cheeto with a wig on!! I am very disappointed this needs to be gone just like Trump🥰.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and it took hours to download and then when I opened it, it continued to crash every time i tried to open it. do better 😡 won’t be using this app in the future
attributes.title: ummm....

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get information about upcoming rallies, but it kept crashing and leading me back to the home screen. VERY DISAPPOINTED. Why does this app need access to my location????? This is an INFRINGEMENT on my RIGHT TO PRIVACY. Do NOT download this app.
attributes.title: Major Glitches

attributes.review: Trump, this app is trash and I wish I could give it a 0 but I can’t and umm don’t ban tiktok🤡 I also hate this app so much is ugly and nasty and I hate 🤮 I literally almost died from just seeing it 🗑 so go throw this away and let ur wife and son be free😤
attributes.title: Tiktok for the win😌💕🧚🏼‍♀️✨💜
